{{also|琴棋書畫|琴棋书画}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きん|き|しょ|が|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
* From {{etyl|ltc|ja}} {{l|zh|琴棋書畫}}. Literally "[[koto|Koto]], [[go]], [[calligraphy]] and [[painting]]".

===Proverb===
{{ja-pos|きんきしょが|proverb}}

# He who is poorly versed in [[koto]], [[go]], [[calligraphy]] or [[painting]] is not a person of taste.
